com.sjtu.idoctor.utils.task

类 SafeAsyncTask<ResultT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sjtu.idoctor.utils.task.SafeAsyncTask<ResultT>
  • 类型参数:
    ResultT -
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.util.concurrent.Callable<ResultT>
    直接已知子类:
    LoadAreaTask, LoadDoctorTask, ProgressDialogTask

    public abstract class SafeAsyncTask<ResultT>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<ResultT>
    Originally from RoboGuice: https://github.com/roboguice/roboguice/blob/master/roboguice/src/main/java/roboguice/util/SafeAsyncTask.java

    A class similar but unrelated to android's AsyncTask.

    Unlike AsyncTask, this class properly propagates exceptions.

    If you're familiar with AsyncTask and are looking for AsyncTask.doInBackground(Object[]), we've named it Callable.call() here to conform with java 1.5's Callable interface.

    Current limitations: does not yet handle progress, although it shouldn't be hard to add.

    If using your own executor, you must call future() to get a runnable you can execute.

      构造器和说明
      SafeAsyncTask()
      Sets executor to Executors.newFixedThreadPool(DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE) and Handler to new Handler()
      SafeAsyncTask(java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
      Sets Handler to new Handler()
      SafeAsyncTask(android.os.Handler handler)
      Sets executor to Executors.newFixedThreadPool(DEFAULT_POOL_SIZE)
      SafeAsyncTask(android.os.Handler handler, java.util.concurrent.Executor executor)
